casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Royal Lee BERRY. No. 116P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of March 2007 by Defendant for "Petition for Review of the Clerk of the Court of Appeals' Action of Signing the Orders in Lieu of the Court of Appeals Judge(s) Signing Orders":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
